title: Any land under non-buildable reservations, admeasuring only up to 500 sq
clause_text: Any land under non-buildable reservations, admeasuring only up to 500 sq. m may be cleared by shifting the existing tenants from that site.
section: (I) Development of reservation in Reconstruction or redevelopment of Cluster(s) of Buildings under Cluster Development Scheme(s)under Regulation No. 33(9):

source_pdf.text_snippet: Any land under non-buildable reservations, admeasuring only up to 500 sq. m may be cleared by shifting the existing tenants from that site.
